articles.author: Karen Gilchrist
articles.title: Anglo American rejects BHP's $39 billion takeover bid to form mining juggernaut - CNBC
articles.description: Mining giant Anglo American on Friday rejected a takeover bid from rival BHP Group, saying the offer "significantly undervalues" the company and its future prospects.
articles.content:
Mining giant Anglo American on Friday rejected a takeover bid from rival BHP Group, saying the offer "significantly undervalues" the company and its future prospects.

articles.title: Takeaways from the Trump hush money trial: Ex-publisher details tabloid tactics - CNN
articles.description: Former American Media Inc. chairman David Pecker took jurors in Donald Trump’s hush money case inside how he paid for Karen McDougal’s story to keep her quiet about her alleged affair with Trump – and how his decision not to pay for Stormy Daniels’ story led …

articles.author: Iain Marlow
articles.title: Blinken to Meet China’s Top Diplomat Wang Yi as Russia Sanctions Loom - Bloomberg
articles.description: China’s top diplomat Wang Yi warned his American counterpart that problems are mounting between the world’s largest economies, as the US threatens Beijing with sanctions for its support of Russia.
articles.content:
